import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./menu.css"; import Side_bar from "./side_bar/side_bar"; export default class Menu extends Component { render() { const open = () =>{ const list = document.querySelector("ul"); list.style.flexDirection = "column"; list.style.display = "flex"; const btn = document.querySelector('.M_bt') btn.style.display = "none"; const btn2 = document.querySelector('.ret') btn2.style.display = "block"; } return (
); } }
